title: N.Y. Comp. Codes R. & Regs. Tit. 6 §§ 350-4.4 - Landfills and combustion facilities
content:
N.Y. Comp. Codes R. & Regs. Tit. 6 §§ 350-4.4 - Landfills and combustion facilities

State Regulations

Combustion facilities and landfills must take all
reasonable precautions to not accept food scraps from designated food scraps
generators who are required to send their food scraps to an organics recycler
or intermediary facility. Notes
N.Y. Comp. Codes R. & Regs. Tit. 6
§§
350-4.4

Adopted

New

York State Register August 11, 2021/Volume XLIII, Issue 32, eff. 1/1/2022

State regulations are updated quarterly; we currently have two versions available. Below is a
comparison between our most recent version and the prior quarterly release. More comparison features will be added as we have more versions to compare. No prior version found.
